New Records: Bowden Francis became one of only two Blue Jays pitchers to have multiple no-hit bids, matching Dave Stieb's record
Key Match Events: Francis had two near-no-hitter attempts in the ninth inning, keeping the game tied before the Mets scored multiple runs
Post-Match Reflections: John Schneider praised Francis' growth and resilience despite the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sean Manaea, the Mets' pitcher, respected Francis' performance
Others: Francis' strong season turnaround and potential as a Blue Jays starter were highlighted
